attributes.action: Directly relate CSA Payments to Access
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: Sick and tired of paying an Ex to live the good life and not see your Children.  I would like a direct relation between Maintenance and Access to Children.  At present there is no incentive for mothers to let fathers who pay for their Children to let them see the father.  So come on, get the Government acting

reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
